talk.author: did:plc:trkccrfz4zw5rqicix52t7td
talk.utter: Make it opt-out by default. Make consent and non-consent very public so that user who do not consent can have something to point to in case of eventual class action lawsuits against outside companies that do not respect the conditions.

talk.author: did:plc:vcu4xukljlgqwek5ekqwgxts
talk.utter: Opt-out would mean that the default behavior is "scrape me".

talk.author: did:plc:trkccrfz4zw5rqicix52t7td
talk.utter: Opt-in would mean scrape me. Opt-out by default means you donâ€™t want your content used. People should have to go and opt-in to get scraped.
